quote: You can actually now put in pictures of a property... it will look at the pictures and write a description of it.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical use of AI in real estate that agents can implement immediately.
suggested_hook: Struggling with property descriptions? Let AI do the heavy lifting!

quote: Taking the extra step and the taking the extra mile to make sure that my clients are happy, satisfied, and they're taken care of.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of client care in building a successful real estate business.
suggested_hook: Want to stand out in real estate? It's all about exceptional client service.
